description:
The "Rebel's Guide to Better Sex" offers you over 2 hours of training via 7 video lectures.

The instructor Jen Springer, who is very direct and instructs with dry humor and dirty wit. Could it be any other way growing up in Chicago? If you love a little bit of raw and sexual puns, you will enjoy Jen's teaching style.


There are no pornographic photos or nude images in this course, but words like "crap, ass, boner, vagina, genitals, penis, and orgasm" are used. So if you're not an uptight student, you'll have a good time learning in this informative course.

Specifically detailed are over 30 ways that you can improve your love life: 10 for men, 10 for women, and 10 for couples. Jen also throws in a few bonuses that spiff up your sexual Kung Fu by giving your the beginner steps to improving your sexual fitness.

The course focuses on ways you can improve your mojo using food, lifestyle, and other easy non-prescriptive solutions. No matter what your age is, you will get something from this information that will make you feel more alive, think clearer, and probably chasing your partner around the house to get some boom-chicky-bow-bow on a more frequent basis.

An educational, fun, and flirty good time!
title: Rebel's Guide to Better Sex
